byline.original: As told to Seth Kugel, who translated some interviews from the Spanish

docs.lead_paragraph: The kitchen at Le Bernardin, the celebrated French seafood restaurant on West 51st Street, bustles with immigrant workers from Latin America and the Caribbean. Many start out as dishwashers and move up the ranks, learning culinary skills (and how to work in a stressful environment) along the way. Manuel Coatl Flores 25, of Washington Heights. Originally from Mexico. I'm a pastry chef. I make ice cream, pastries, the dough for tarts, chocolate mixes, sauces. I had worked once making cakes in Mexico, but that was different. Here there's a lot of pressure, the rhythm is much faster. I dedicate a lot of my free time to reviewing what I learned that day.
docs.abstract: Interviews with workers from Latin America and Caribbean at Le Bernardin restaurant; photo (Special Issue: The Next Wave) (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: SAP, Europe's most valuable technology company, is confident it will hit its 2016 profit target based on its order portfolio in the all-important fourth quarter and sees no obstacle to raising its dividend, Luka Mucic, the company's chief financial officer, said on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Marvin Minsky, the artificial intelligence pioneer who helped make machines think, leading to computers that understand spoken commands and beat grandmasters at chess, has died at the age of 88, the Massachusetts Institute of Technology said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Even when inspired by deep department store discounts, I've never been good at simple calculations. After a particularly satisfying vacation, I've been known to forget how to turn on my computer. Never in my life have I been tempted to take apart a household appliance or look under the hood of the family sedan. In other words, I'm about as far from a geek as a person can be.
docs.abstract: After a particularly satisfying vacation, I've been known to forget how to turn on my computer. Never in my life have I been tempted to take apart a household appliance or look under the hood of the family sedan. In other words, I'm about as far from a geek as a person can be. So why am I happily browsing through "Geekspeak: How Life + Mathematics = Happiness"?

docs.lead_paragraph: The Venezuelan president has made up a crisis with two neighbors in an effort to rally support ahead of parliamentary elections.
docs.abstract: Editorial repudiates Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro for his recent antagonism towards Colombia, including declaring a state of emergency along the border for alleged surge in crime; blames president's behavior on dip in polls and difficulties in consolidating support for upcoming elections.
